Materials Soybean phosphatidylcholine (SPC), N-(Carbonyl-methoxypolyethylene glycol 2000) 1,2-distearoyl-sn-glycerol-3-phosphoethanolamine (DSPE-mPEG 2000 The murine breast cancer cell line 4T1 (4T1 cells) was acquired from the Type Culture Collection of the Chinese Academy of Sciences in Shanghai, China. Healthy male ICR mice, weighing between 18 and 20 g, were procured from the Laboratory Animal Center at Chongqing Medical University in Chongqing, China. All animal procedures conducted in this study were carried out in accordance with the Guidelines for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals established by Chongqing Medical University.
